title: The UnderWorld Tournament! [FINISHED- Update 2]
body:
The little tournament for my club members is finished!

I hope they had fun, I had to solo cast it which was a little bit of a strain on me.
Got some awesome moments, and some not so awesome moments.

The winners received $10 RP each (1100 RP in total)
And a 10 win IP boost, thanks to Marauder.

The losing team, thanks again to Marauder gets a consolation of a 4 Win IP Boost.

Each team captain, Fitzky and Yasho got to pick there fellow summoners.
Even though some summoners couldn't participate, or show up/Answer.
We had some subs to fill in.

They played a tournament Draft Pick and Ban mode.
best out of 3 games.

The winners are!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

TEAM A!

Fitzky- Top
Qube- Jungle
Essembie- Mid
Miicka- Marksman
Chobi- Support

The losers.

Team B

Yasho- Top
Jonius7- Jungle
Devil/HDMI- Mid
Eleftheria- Marksman
Somebody Not You- Support.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I hope you guys had fun!

It wasn't streamed.
But it was recorded.

Both Captains had there sided recorded too, unfortunately Skin Spotlights did not want to work :(

But you can find the future footage's here:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8x_OF9Fo1vb8NkaASrXaXQ

(Will be posted within the next week)

replies.body: The ip boosts have been distributed =D
would you be keen on themed tourneys in future? Like freljord vs yordles etc?

Well, this is something I'm working.

This tournament was actually a test (For myself).

I still wanna make that "FOR SHURIMA" video, you may have noticed in the discord channel, I had another chat room called that.
I actually wanna get AS MANY summoners as possible to join in on that vid.

I wan't to get every summoner to scream "FOR SHURIMA" and have like a chorus involving the board members.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I do wan't to host more (Proper- Tournaments.)
The only issue is, its hard by myself, and I'm still figuring out riots tournament thing that they have.

> [{quoted}](name=Yasei Doubutsu,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=F1xWAAlI,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-11-13T08:02:27.413+0000)
>
> Well, this is something I'm working.
> 
> This tournament was actually a test (For myself).
> 
> I still wanna make that "FOR SHURIMA" video, you may have noticed in the discord channel, I had another chat room called that.
> I actually wanna get AS MANY summoners as possible to join in on that vid.
> 
> I wan't to get every summoner to scream "FOR SHURIMA" and have like a chorus involving the board members.
> 
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
> 
> I do wan't to host more (Proper- Tournaments.)
> The only issue is, its hard by myself, and I'm still figuring out riots tournament thing that they have.

The little bloke makes it hard to play sometimes but if I can help in anyway I will - just let me know.

Thanks so much Yasei, for the RP, and for hosting the tournament which was super fun!

Also thanks Fitzky for carrying us in that second game xD the godlike Darius top.

I hope Yasei holds another one of these, it was so much fun! (Don't worry dude you don't have to spend 50 bucks on us the IP boost was good enough xD)
The dunk gods were with me {{champion:122}}
was lots of fun. Thanks for organising!
